edu.harvard.chs.cite
[Groovy] Class CitationModel

java.lang.Object
  edu.harvard.chs.cite.CitationModel

class CitationModel

A utility class for use within the cite library to represent a citation model for a given work. A CitationModel maps one or more abstract citation schemes onto the elements of a (single) validating schema using one CitationTriplet for each level of each citation scheme's hierarchy. This implements CTS's support for multiple citation schemes in a single work with an ordered array of CitationTriplet objects. Sequentially applying the CitationTriplets' scopePattern property processes all citable elements in the document, in document order.

Property Summary
java.lang.String labelSeparator

Configurable value for use in path-like display of label information.
java.util.ArrayList mappings

Array of citation triplets defining the mapping of the abstract citation scheme onto the schema identified by schemaIdent

getXpathList

java.util.ArrayList getXpathList()
Gets an ordered ArrayList of Xpath expressions for all CitationTriplets in this model. Applying all of these Xpaths to the original document is equivalent to selecting all citable nodes of the original document in document order.
returns:
An ArrayList of Xpath Strings.

getXpathList

java.util.ArrayList getXpathList(int level)

returns:
An ArrayList of Xpath Strings.

mapHierarchy

Parameters:
